channel.title: When Enemy is dead the killer recieves money
channel.description:
Base : PI
I want to make a spawn / Pk server. That means i want to add a huge amount of Features to it.
The problem is, i dont know how to add when a player kills the enemy, that the player who killed the enemy gets a fee of (example : 750 k)
